xstampp.ui.navigation

Class AbstractSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • xstampp.ui.navigation.AbstractSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelection, IProjectSelection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategorySelector, ProjectSelector, StepSelector

    public abstract class AbstractSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements IProjectSelection
    A Selector is connected to a treeItem and manages the interaction between the platform and the ProjectTree
    Author:
    Lukas Balzer
